name: Cake Ninja: XMAS
synopsis: It is simple, fun and very popular game series! Slide the stylus across the screen to slice snowballs into small pieces like a true Ninja warrior. The more snowballs you slice, the longer you stay around, and the longer you survive, the higher your score. How long can you last? Key Features: Simple, addictive gameplay Colorful 3D graphics Precise slice recognition
